Specimen Container(s): Swab in transport media (BD VTM, M4, M4RT, M5, M6, UTM)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Simplexa HSV 1 & 2 Direct qualitative real-time PCR assay system to detect and differentiate HSV-1 and HSV-2 DNA in genital lesion swab specimens
Indications for Use Summary: For qualitative detection and differentiation of HSV-1 and HSV-2 DNA in genital lesion swabs from patients with signs and symptoms of genital HSV infection; aids differential diagnosis of HSV-1 and HSV-2 genital infections and used with 3M Integrated Cycler; not intended for blood or blood products.
